constraint=". <= 'today()'" id="date" message="Invalid date: date specified is in the future" nodeset="/anc/date" required="true()" type="xsd:date"/> <xf:bind id="motechid" nodeset="/anc/motechid" required="true()" type="xsd:int"/> <xf:bind id="visitNumber" nodeset="/anc/visitNumber" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="estDeliveryDate" nodeset="/anc/estDeliveryDate" type="xsd:date"/> <xf:bind constraint=". >= 60 and . <= 300" id="bpSystolic" message="Value out of range: must be between 60 and 300" nodeset="/anc/bpSystolic" type="xsd:int"/> <xf:bind constraint=". >= 45 and . <= 140" id="bpDiastolic" message="Value out of range: Must be between 45 and 140" nodeset="/anc/bpDiastolic" type="xsd:int"/> <xf:bind constraint=". >= 10 and . <= 500" id="weight" message="Value out of range: must be between 10 and 500" nodeset="/anc/weight" type="xsd:decimal"/> <xf:bind id="ttdose" nodeset="/anc/ttdose" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind 'Y'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="dewormer" nodeset="/anc/dewormer" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="pmtct" nodeset="/anc/pmtct" nodeset="/anc/postTestCounseled" relevant="/anc/hivTestResult = 'POSITIVE' or /anc/hivTestResult = 'NEGATIVE'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" version.xform: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <xf:xforms xmlns:xf="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xf:model> <xf:instance id="generalopd"> <generalopd id="64" name="Outpatient Visit"> <staffId/> <facilityId/> <formname/> <date/> <serialNumber/> <motechId/> <sex/> <dateOfBirth/> <insured/> <newCase/> <diagnosis/> <otherdiagnosis/> <secondDiagnosis/> <othersecondarydiagnosis/> <rdtGiven/> <rdtPositive/> <actTreated/> <referred/> <comments/> <formtype>data_entry</formtype> </generalopd> </xf:instance> <xf:bind id="staffId" nodeset="/generalopd/staffId" required="true()" type="xsd:int"/> <xf:bind id="facilityId" nodeset="/generalopd/facilityId" required="true()" type="xsd:int"/> <xf:bind id="formname" nodeset="/generalopd/formname" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind constraint=". <= 'today()'" id="date" message="Invalid date: date specified is in the future" nodeset="/generalopd/date" required="true()" type="xsd:date"/> <xf:bind constraint=". >= 0" id="serialNumber" message="Negative number not allowed" nodeset="/generalopd/serialNumber" required="true()" type="xsd:int"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="motechId" nodeset="/generalopd/motechId" relevant="/generalopd/formname = 'motheropd-jf' or /generalopd/formname = 'childopd-jf'" type="xsd:int" visible="false()" required="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="sex" nodeset="/generalopd/sex" relevant="/generalopd/formname = 'generalopd-jf'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" constraint=". <= 'today()'" id="dateOfBirth" message="Invalid date: date specified is in the future" nodeset="/generalopd/dateOfBirth" relevant="/generalopd/formname = 'generalopd-jf'" required="true()" type="xsd:date" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="insured" nodeset="/generalopd/insured" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="newCase" nodeset="/generalopd/newCase" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="diagnosis" nodeset="/generalopd/diagnosis" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind action="show" constraint=". >= 1 and . <= 76" id="otherdiagnosis" message="Invalid diagnosis: value must be between 1 and 76" nodeset="/generalopd/otherdiagnosis" relevant="/generalopd/diagnosis = '78'" required="true()" type="xsd:int" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="secondDiagnosis" nodeset="/generalopd/secondDiagnosis" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind action="show" constraint=". >= 1 and . <= 76" id="othersecondarydiagnosis" message="Invalid diagnosis: value must be between 1 and 76" nodeset="/generalopd/othersecondarydiagnosis" relevant="/generalopd/secondDiagnosis = '78'" required="true()" type="xsd:int" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="rdtGiven" nodeset="/generalopd/rdtGiven" relevant="/generalopd/diagnosis = '63' or /generalopd/diagnosis = '64' or /generalopd/diagnosis = '10' or /generalopd/diagnosis = '11' or /generalopd/diagnosis = '13' or /generalopd/diagnosis = '12' or /generalopd/secondDiagnosis = '63' or /generalopd/secondDiagnosis = '64' or /generalopd/secondDiagnosis = '10' or /generalopd/secondDiagnosis = '11' or /generalopd/secondDiagnosis = '13' or /generalopd/secondDiagnosis = '12'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="rdtPositive" nodeset="/generalopd/rdtPositive" relevant="/generalopd/rdtGiven = 'Y'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="actTreated" nodeset="/generalopd/actTreated" relevant="/generalopd/diagnosis = '63' or /generalopd/diagnosis = '64' or /generalopd/secondDiagnosis = '63' or /generalopd/secondDiagnosis = '64'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="referred" nodeset="/generalopd/referred" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="comments" nodeset="/generalopd/comments" 48" nodeset="/pncbaby/temperature" required="true()" type="xsd:decimal"/> <xf:bind id="location" nodeset="/pncbaby/location" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="house" relevant="/pncbaby/location = '2'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="referred" nodeset="/pncbaby/referred" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="maleInvolved" nodeset="/pncbaby/maleInvolved" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind constraint=". >= 10 and . <= 60" id="respiration" message="Value out of range: must be between 10 and 60" nodeset="/pncbaby/respiration" required="true()" type="xsd:int"/> <xf:bind id="cordConditionNormal" nodeset="/pncbaby/cordConditionNormal" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind
